Chirp.title: Chirp
Chirp.content:
Chirp is an elegant, ultra-minimalist AI chat overlay built for seamless interaction with local LLMs like LLaMA 3 via Ollama. It launches as a transparent, always-on-top sidebar that auto-hides when not in use and instantly reappears when your cursor approaches the bottom of your screen â€” like a whisper waiting to be heard.
No visible UI clutter. No toggles. Just you, your thoughts, and an AI ready to talk.
